post:
Luna Node

Luna Node provides high quality unmanaged VPS hosting at an affordable price. We exclusively use KVM on all plans for the greater control that it gives users. At the moment we're offering various plans in Chicago with 512 MB to 8192 MB memory. We take payments through PayPal (either through PayPal account or credit card) and Bitcoin.


All plans come with RAID10 HDD storage; they can be upgraded from a single IPv4 address to 5 IPv4 addresses for $3.00/mo or 13 IPv4 addresses for $7.50/mo (note that justification is required for this upgrade).

We offer a custom VM control panel that features the typical management options. Servers are provisioned out of SingleHop's Chicago datacenter.

All plans come with a free wildcard or single-domain AlphaSSL certificate (additional certificates are $2/yr). cPanel VM licenses are available at $10/mo.

Custom ISO's are available on all plans if you open a ticket. Windows is also available if you have your own license.

Order budget VPS now! Or contact sales@lunanode.com for questions. Upload your PGP public key to our PGP web interface to receive encrypted mail from us.
